meanings.sent1: The fact remained uncontradicted in the court.
meanings.sent2: Her uncontradicted statement was accepted as the truth.
meanings.sent3: The uncontradicted evidence left no room for doubt.
meanings.sent4: His uncontradicted alibi cleared him of any suspicion.
meanings.sent5: The uncontradicted testimony of the witness was crucial for the case.

meanings.sent1: The proposal was uncontradicted by any member of the committee.
meanings.sent2: His uncontradicted decision was implemented without delay.
meanings.sent3: The uncontradicted plan proceeded smoothly without any objections.
meanings.sent4: Her uncontradicted authority was unquestioned by her subordinates.
meanings.sent5: The uncontradicted support from the team boosted his confidence.
